articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Jae Un
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Jae Un
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on Sunday sent a wreath to the bier of Academician, Prof. and Dr. Kim Jae Un, a researcher of Kim Il Sung University who is winner of Kim Jong Il Prize and People's Scientist, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Korean Youth Vow to Glorify Conference of Mallima Frontrunners
articles.content:
Korean Youth Vow to Glorify Conference of Mallima Frontrunners
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Members of the young vanguard met at the Youth Park Open-Air Theatre on Monday to vow to glorify the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners as one of victors.
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, officials concerned, youth league officials and youth and students.
					
					 The appeal, made by the creators of the Spirit of Kangwon Province to all working people across the country, was read out before speeches.
					
					 The speakers stressed the need to fully discharge the mission and duty of the young vanguard in the ongoing campaign for creating Mallima speed.
					
					 They called on the young people to create legendary tales about heroic youth in the era of Mallima one after another in the van of the drive for carrying out the leader's behests and defending the Party's policies.
					
					 They declared that the youth would demonstrate their mettle before the whole world by creating everything at the world level with locally available raw and other materials and dashing ahead to achieve prosperity.
					
					 They also underlined the need to make the work sites for a great upswing alive with a youth drive and make a breakthrough in the most difficult and labor-consuming worksites in response to the Party's call.
					
					 They stressed that they would proudly enter the venue of the conference, recording heroic feats in their CVs as befitting masters of the Paektusan youth power under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Held in Cities and Counties
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Held in Cities and Counties
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in cities and counties of the DPRK to respond to the appeal made by the creators of the Spirit of Kangwon Province to the working people across the country.
					 At the rallies, the appeal was read out before speeches.
					
					 The speakers expressed their resolve to devotedly implement the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the Party's policies just as the people in Kangwon Province did.
					
					 They called on all the fields and units to surely attain ahead of schedule the goals for this year of key significance in implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 They stressed the need for the light industrial factories and the local industrial establishments to boost the production of goods enough to go to world market and favored by people.
					
					 They also called for intensify the fishing operations to bring about great fish hauls in the seas. 
					
					 They declared they would build more dwelling houses, kindergartens and nurseries by their own efforts to turn urban and rural areas into a socialist land of bliss.
					
					 They expressed the will to glorify the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners as one of victors that will be a watershed in building a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Harnessing Solar Energy Gains Momentum in DPRK
articles.content:
Harnessing Solar Energy Gains Momentum in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Natural Energy Institute of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK have pushed ahead with the research into making comprehensive use of solar energy.
					 They set it as a goal to turn the Ryuwon Footwear Factory into an icon and standard one and have solved sci-tech problems together with employees of the factory.
					
					 A stable and highly efficient solar generation system was established with solar panels covering roofs of several buildings in the factory and its generating capacity reaches several hundreds kW.
					
					 The scientists also made a solar collector to build a hot-water supply system based on solar water-heater in the factory.
					
					 Thanks to their efforts, a soilless solar-heat greenhouse with an area of over 300 square meters took its shape, equipped with drip irrigation system, automatic system for supplying nutrient solutions and comprehensive measurement system.

articles.title: Light Comedy "Northern Battlefield" on Stage in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Light Comedy "Northern Battlefield" on Stage in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The light comedy "Northern Battlefield" is given by film workers at the Pyongyang International Cinema House in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 It deals with a story about the loving care for the people shown by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) during the recovery campaign in the flood-hit northern part of North Hamgyong Province last year.
					
					 Every scene of the comedy shows well the steady outlook on the people of the WPK, which regards it as the most important state affair to put the people out of sufferings and directs every possible effort to the disaster rehabilitation, and the noble socialist ethics.
					
					 The comedy leaves a deep impression on audience for its comedic and legitimate modality.

articles.title: U.S. Slightest Misjudgment of DPRK Will Lead It to Final Doom: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Slightest Misjudgment of DPRK Will Lead It to Final Doom: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. administration is floating a rumor that it is examining a way of mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					 Various media including VOA, CNN and the Wall Street Journal carried articles to the effect that the White House is now examining strategies targeting the DPRK ranging from preemptive attack to regime change, anticipating a military conflict on the Korean peninsula within a month or two.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that experts on the Korean issue are commenting in unison that the U.S. planned military attack on the DPRK is a crazy act of inviting irrevocable disasters.
					
					 Harry J. Kazianis, room chief for defense studies of the Center for the National Interest and researcher for national security of the Potomac Foundation, warned that attack aimed at removing the regime in north Korea will invite an irrevocable disaster. He asserted that military invasion of north Korea is a crazy act, adding north Korea, which is well aware of foolishness of Saddam Hussein who allowed the deployment of the world's most powerful war forces just at its doorstep, would not miss an opportunity but mount an attack by mobilizing all possible forces under its possession in case there is a sign of deployment of armed forces. He also said that if the U.S. is true in its decision to "overthrow" the regime in north Korea, there can be no reason for north Korea to tolerate, stressing that what should be taken into consideration is that north Korea has maintained its social system for over six decades to counter possible invasion by the U.S.
					
					 Researcher of Defense Priorities Bonnie Kristian in a commentary titled "No, let's not invade north Korea" said that the plan for a preemptive attack on north Korea will bring diverse disaster as it is a big blunder rather than a wise alternative. The commentary said that north Korea will decide on a powerful nuclear strike the moment it senses an imminent attack by the U.S., adding that it will be very stressful for the Trump administration to try to find out a solution to the issue of north Korea but military option will entail much greater danger let alone interests.
					
					 The chairman of the U.S. Council of Foreign Relations when interviewed by media, warned that the Trump administration is at crossroads of crucial choice of whether to co-exist with north Korea possessed of capabilities of attacking the U.S. or disable nuclear and missile capabilities of north Korea by use of military force.
					
					 This cannot but be wise advices to the Trump administration's hard-line stand toward the DPRK.
					
					 The present U.S. administration is repeating senseless policy of nuclear blackmail which would bring only defeat, from the outset of its office, far from drawing a lesson from the failed north Korea policy of the preceding regimes.
					
					 It has gone foolish to plan a preemptive attack while pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war by staging joint military drills with the south Korean puppet forces with the involvement of nuclear strategic assets like carrier task force, nuclear submarines, B-1B, B-52, B-2 strategic bomber triad.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop the foolish act of pricking its eyes with its own fingers.
					
					 Nothing can undermine the strategic position of the DPRK that has reached the highest level.
					
					 Now that the U.S. started dangerous nuclear war drills again, the DPRK has no option but to counter it with the toughest measures for bolstering the nuclear force as it had already declared.
					
					 If even a single shell is fired into the territory in which the sovereignty of the DPRK is exercised, the bases of aggression and provocation will be reduced to such debris that no living thing can be found.
					
					 The U.S. should properly understand that its slightest misjudgment about the DPRK will lead it to final doom.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon All to Be Frontrunners in Mallima Movement
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon All to Be Frontrunners in Mallima Movement
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- To be riders and frontrunners in the Mallima movement is the bounden duty and noble obligation of our generations who were born in the motherland of Juche and grew up learning the epic of the Chollima age, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Mallima frontrunners are persons who remain loyal to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, sharing idea and intention with him and keeping pace with him and staunch fighters who are taking the lead in the drive for implementing the indomitable offensive-oriented revolutionary idea of the Workers' Party of Korea and the spirit of self-development first with faith in sure victory.
					
					 They are possessors of science and technology as they settle everything by dint of science and technology and the persons who have acquired the spirit of collectivism as they devote themselves to society and collective, organizations and comrades.
					
					 All the fields, units, provinces, cities and counties of the country should wage a dynamic drive to have the honor of being Mallima frontrunners in hearty response to the appeal of Kangwon Province.
					
					 Every province should create spirit of the times worthy of being named after it and boldly carry out operations for attaining self-sufficiency with things available in it and ushering in a heyday of prosperity. Provinces, cities and counties should build factories and dwelling houses and manufacture products by their own efforts and with indigenous technology and resources in such a way that their characters are preserved.
					
					 The advanced units should make uninterrupted innovations and advances while those backward ones should work harder to catch up with the former by learning each other and thus make a high-pitched drive for increased production, creation and all-out charge on all fronts for building a socialist power.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Regime for Seeking to Maintain Park Geun Hye's Policy of Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Regime for Seeking to Maintain Park Geun Hye's Policy of Confrontation
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are making desperate efforts to maintain traitor Park Geun Hye's policy of confrontation with compatriots to the last despite the denunciation by the people from all walks of life, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The warmongers including Chief of the Security Office of Chongwadae Kim Kwan Jin and puppet Minister of Defense Han Min Gu are kicking up a confrontation racket, crying out for "strong counteraction against provocation from the north" while puppet Minister of Foreign Affairs Yun Pyong Se is busy touring different countries to solicit cooperation in the campaign to put pressure upon the DPRK. Puppet minister of Unification Hong Yong Phyo zealously supported Park Guen Hye's policy of confrontation with compatriots and is persistently following the standoff with the north, talking about "adherence to principle and consistence" and "focusing on sanctions against the north".
					
					 The commentary terms the puppet group of traitors' reckless ruckus a blatant challenge to the mind-set of broad public in south Korea and unpardonable act of escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula and bringing the danger of a nuclear war on this land. 
					
					 The Park group's policy of confrontation with compatriots met a stern judgment by the nation after going totally bust, it says, adding:
					
					 The above-said traitors should be sent to their graves along with Park Geun Hye as they are leading accomplices in the hideous scandal who took the lead in bringing the inter-Korean relations to collapse under the pulls and pressures of shaman Choe Sun Sil who manipulated the diplomatic and security policies of the present conservative regime and despicable human scum.
					
					 It is the final conclusion that the misfortune should be rooted out in good time and a stick is fit for a rabid dog.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japan for Its Reckless Moves to Revive Militarism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japan for Its Reckless Moves to Revive Militarism
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Chinese Xinhua News Agency said in an article titled "Three secrets of Japan's military spending" that there are three secrets in Japan's snowballing military budget.
					 It disclosed that one of them is to spend much more funds as actual annual military spending than the amount specified in the government budget under the pretext of the "supplementary budget." 
					
					 Commenting upon this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says Japan's increase of military spending does not aim at the country's security and regional peace but repetition of its past history of invasion.
					
					 Japan should not forget the disgrace the generation suffered by sustaining a defeat in the war, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Japan defined the DPRK as its primary target of invasion.
					
					 However, the present times are not the first half of the 20th century when Japan ran wild with wars of aggression while crying out for the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
					
					 It is worth recalling what former soldiers of the Imperial Japanese Army confessed at press conferences. They admitted they inflicted great sufferings upon Asians and for that reason they were defeated. This is a serious lesson that invaders have no future.
					
					 Japan should stop its foolish moves to revive militarism.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to behave themselves, bearing in mind that the road of overseas invasion is the one making Hinomaru fall into a ditch and Kimikayo heard as a dirge for the defeated state.

articles.title: 20th All-People Action Staged across S. Korea
articles.content:
20th All-People Action Staged across S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The 20th all-people action on the theme of "Day of victory" was staged across south Korea on March 11 with people of various circles involved under the sponsorship of the People's Emergency Action for Forcing the Park Geun Hye Regime to Resign, according to south Korean media.
					 A candlelight rally took place in Seoul.
					
					 Earlier, the 2017 declaration on the rights of candlelight reflecting hope for a new society after the resignation of Park and wishes for reforms in various fields was made public.
					
					 A candlelight rally started with attendance of at least 708,100 people of different social standings.
					
					 The floor was taken by a worker, student, religionist and citizens.
					
					 While the rally was under way, the participants watched a video showing the "Constitutional Court" making a decision on removing Park from office.
					
					 During the rally signature campaigns were conducted at the plaza as regards social issues such as opposition to THAAD and the abolition of part-time jobs, guarantee of three rights of labor and release of Ri Sok Gi.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged a demonstration towards Chongwadae and office of the "prime minister".
					
					 They held again an event hailing the victory in the candlelight action at the Kwanghwamun plaza.
					
					 Meanwhile, such similar rallies took place in Kwangju, Jeju Island and other parts of south Korea.

articles.title: Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization made public a statement on Mar. 6 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises aimed at mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the U.S. kicked off undisguised war games aimed at bringing a nuclear disaster to the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, adding:
					
					 The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization strongly opposes and denounces the military drills being staged by the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 The statement said that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address clarified the stand that the DPRK would continue to bolster up the self-defence capability, the pivot of which is the nuclear force, and the capability for preemptive strike unless the United States and its vassal forces cease their war drills at its doorstep under the disguise of annual ones.
					
					 If the U.S. desires true world peace, it should ponder over its saber-rattling.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' Nuclear War Drills Flailed by Koreans' Organization in China
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' Nuclear War Drills Flailed by Koreans' Organization in China
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Shenyang City Branch of the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China held a meeting on March 8 to denounce the anti-DPRK nuclear war maneuvers of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					 A joint statement, issued by the north, south and overseas headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), was read out at the meeting.
					
					 Speakers there expressed full support to the joint statement.
					
					 They stressed that all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should turn out as one in the struggle against the nuclear war drills being staged by the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces against the north.

articles.title: Koreans in China Condemn U.S.-S. Korea Joint Drills
articles.content:
Koreans in China Condemn U.S.-S. Korea Joint Drills
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, in a statement issued  on March 11 lashed out at the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers for staging the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills  for aggression  in the sky, sea and land of south Korea from March 1.
					 The statement accused the U.S. of openly claiming that the goal of the on-going saber-rattling is to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK after completely discarding its signboard that it is "annual and defensive."
					
					 The Koreans should not allow the inviolable land of the country to be used as military bases and theatres of war drills of outside forces, it held.

articles.title: Uruguayan, Brazilian Papers Demand U.S. Roll back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Uruguayan, Brazilian Papers Demand U.S. Roll back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Uruguayan and Brazilian papers carried articles urging the U.S. to recognize the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons and roll back its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					 The February issue of the organ of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Uruguay said in an article:
					
					 Major institutes for foreign policy studies and experts on Korean affairs of the U.S. and Western media are becoming increasingly assertive calling for making a switchover in the U.S. policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 As everybody knows, it has been the invariable policy target of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. ever more undisguised hostile policy towards the DPRK compelled it to opt for bolstering up its nuclear deterrence both in quality and quantity.
					
					 The paper accused the U.S. of persistently refusing to recognize the status of the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 In the past the U.S. threatened and blackmailed the DPRK with nukes but today the DPRK is pressurizing the U.S. with its tremendous military muscle.
					
					 The U.S. should properly understand the changed strategic position of the DPRK and roll back its anachronistic hostile policy towards it.
					
					 The Brazilian paper Patria Latina on Feb. 27 and 28 in articles slammed the U.S. for refusing to recognize even the legitimate rights of the DPRK, and termed such move a revelation of its hostile policy toward the DPRK and such hostile act a wanton violation of the international law.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign media highly praised leader Kim Jong Il for performing gigantic feats before the times and history, in the run-up to his birth anniversary.
					 The AKP of Cambodia reported that Kim Jong Il hardly had rest and was always pressed against time as he visited wherever the people lived - factories, farms and schools.
					
					 It praised his outlooks on the people and life, saying that he lived with pure conscience, always finding himself among the people and that he devoted his all to the future of the country which will be prosperous.
					
					 The State Radio Broadcasting, Apsara Radio Broadcasting and F.M. 90. 5 Radio of Cambodia also introduced in detail his great ideo-theoretical exploits and Songun leadership exploits.
					
					 Renaissance Radio of Guinea elaborated on how immortal flower Kimjongilia came into existence in the world, adding that the flower will be in full bloom along with the yearnings and reverence of progressive mankind for him.
					
					 The TV Broadcasting of DR Congo and the DRTV Broadcasting of Congo aired such Korean films as "Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp" and "Eternal Treasures in Praise of Great Man" at prime time.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Kim Jae Un
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Kim Jae Un
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 12 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kim Jae Un, laureado con el Premio Kim Jong Il y Cientifico del Pueblo, Academico, Profesor y Doctor titulares e investigador de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: OSPAA condena simulacros militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
OSPAA condena simulacros militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Organizacion de Solidaridad de los Pueblos Afro-Asiaticos hizo publica el dia 6 una declaracion condenando los ejercicios militares conjuntos de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea para emprender el golpe preventivo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					A pesar de las repetidas advertencias de la RPDC, los Estados Unidos desarrolla al fin y al cabo los simulacros militares conjuntos para llevar la Peninsula Coreana y el Noreste de Asia a la calamidad nuclear, senala la misiva y apunta como sigue:
					
					La OSPAA rechaza resueltamente el entrenamiento militar conjunto EE.UU-Sur de Corea.
					
					En su mensaje del Ano Nuevo, Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del pueblo coreano, expreso claramente que mientras los Estados Unidos y sus seguidores no dejen de realizar en el contorno de la RPDC los ejercicios de guerra con la excusa de que es una tradicion efectuarlos ano tras ano, esta seguira reforzando su capacidad de autodefensa y de ataque preventivo centrada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Si EE.UU. desea la paz verdadera del mundo, debe meditar bien.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe tomar opcion correcta: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe tomar opcion correcta: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, la administracion norteamericana divulga el rumor de que esta examinando el proyecto de ataque preventivo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Segun los articulos recien publicados por VOA, CNN, Wall Street Journal y otros medios estadounidenses, la Casa Blanca esta revisando ahora la estrategia sobre la RPDC desde el ataque preventivo hasta el "cambio del poder". Pronostican ademas que es posible que ocurra el choque armado en la Peninsula Coreana dentro de uno o dos meses proximos.
					
					Por otra parte, los especialistas en asuntos coreanos evaluan unanimemente el posible ataque militar de EE.UU. contra la RPDC como locura que causara desastres irreparables.
					
					Harry J. Kazianis, jefe de la seccion de estudios de defensa del Centro de Interes Nacional e investigador de asuntos de la seguridad nacional de la Fundacion Potomac, comento como sigue:
					
					El ataque para eliminar el poder norcoreano causara el desastre irreparable. Es una locura la invasion armada contra el Norte de Corea. Este pais conoce muy bien la estupidez de Saddam Hussein, quien permitio el despliegue delante de su casa de las fuerzas armadas mas poderosas del mundo, por eso, ya en la etapa inicial de emplazamiento, iniciara el ataque, sin perder la oportunidad, con todas sus fuerzas armadas existentes. Si EE.UU. hubiera decidido "derrocar" el poder norcoreano, eso seria un acto insoportable para el Norte de Corea. Hay que tener en cuenta que el Norte de Corea ya defendio su poder durante mas de 60 anos frente a la invasion norteamericana.
					
					Bonnie Kristian, investigador de Defense Priorities, organo estadounidense de investigacion de las politicas de defensa nacional, senalo en su comentario intitulado "No agresion al Norte de Corea" como lo siguiente:
					
					El plan de ataque preventivo contra el Norte de Corea no es la opcion sensata sino el error fatal que traera varias desgracias. Ya en el momento en que se da cuenta de la inminencia del ataque de EE.UU., el Norte de Corea decidira el ataque nuclear demoledor. Buscar la solucion del problema del Norte de Corea es un rompecabezas para la administracion Trump, pero el metodo militar no aportara beneficios sino causara el peligro mucho mas grave.
					
					El presidente del Consejo de Relaciones Exteriores, en una entrevista de prensa sostenida recientemente, advirtio que la administracion Trump se encuentra en el dilema fatal de coexistir con el Norte de Corea capaz de atacar a EE.UU. o destruir su capacidad de misiles nucleares mediante el uso de fuerzas armadas.
					
					Son consejos acertados sobre la politica intransigente de la administracion Trump al Norte de Corea.
					
					Sin sacar lecciones del fracaso de las politicas sobre Corea de los poderes anteriores, la actual administracion repite la politica de chantaje nuclear que no tiene ninguna posibilidad de triunfar.
					
					Al movilizar en los ejercicios militares conjuntos con el Sur de Corea todas sus propiedades estrategicas nucleares como portaaviones y submarinos y los 3 tipos de bombardero B-1B, B-52 y B-2, lleva la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al borde de guerra nuclear planeando estupidamente el ataque preventivo.
					
					Le convendria a EE.UU. dejar desde ahora la tonteria de lanzarse al fuego con gasolina.
					
					Nadie podra romper la posicion estrategica de la RPDC en el plano cimero.
					
					Ya que EE.UU. inicio de nuevo el peligroso simulacro nuclear en la cara de la RPDC, esta se ve obligada a tomar contramedidas superintransigentes para aumentar sus fuerzas nucleares como ya lo ha declarado.
					
					Seran devastados los bastiones de agresion y provocacion si un solo obus cae en la zona jurisdiccional de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. debera tener presente que su menor equivocacion sobre la RPDC le conducira al arruinamiento definitivo.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia la ubicacion de THAAD en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia la ubicacion de THAAD en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- Obedeciendo a la demanda bandidesca de EE.UU., los titeres surcoreanos emplazan por fin en su tierra el sistema antimisiles THAAD. Hace poco, llegaron a la base de fuerzas aereas norteamericanas en Osan del Sur de Corea 2 plataformas de lanzamiento y otros anexos del sistema antimisiles.
					En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 12, el periodico Minju Joson lo califica de un perverso crimen antinacional que perjudica la seguridad y el interes de la nacion y destruye la estabilidad y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Noreste Asiatico. 
					
					La ubicacion de THAAD sera la fuente de los inimaginables danos humanos, economicos y ambientales de la poblacion surcoreana, entretanto, exacerbara aun mas la tension militar en la Peninsula Coreana, convertira el territorio patrio en el teatro de guerra nuclear del imperio y las fuerzas seguidoras e impondra a la nacion coreana las calamidades nucleares.
					
					La intencion del pais norteamericano es emprender en cualquier tiempo el inesperado golpe sorpresivo contra el cualquier lugar, vigilando hasta la profundidad de China y Rusia con el THAAD emplazado en el suelo surcoreano.
					
					De veras, la banda surcoreana es lacayo fiel a EE.UU. y deviene la verguenza de la nacion y el factor de desastre.
					
					Ella no podra evitar el maltrato y la humillacion, la condena y el rechazo de la nacion coreana y la sociedad internacional.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun advierte a Japon enloquecido en rehabilitacion de militarismo
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia la ubicacion de THAAD en Sur de Corea
